modName: thedoodlebob aka PillowFun's Merged Followers Pack
summary: Merged Follower pack including Lendri, Rimona, and Wren.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6][b]thedoodlebob/PillowFun's Merged Follower Pack
[/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana][color=#c9daf8][size=3][b]featuring[/b][/size][/color][/font][/center][center][size=5][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81146/?]Lendri[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80518/?]Rimona[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80702/?]Wren[/url]
[/b][/size][i][size=2]*Merged For Convenience*[/size]
[/i]
Based on thedoodlebob/PillowFun's Characters on their [url=http://pillowfun.tumblr.com/]Tumblr[/url] & [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/142802153@N06/]Flickr[/url] Account
Permission granted for follower creation by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?]thedoodlebob[/url] aka PIllowFun

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/jeby2thtz/20170116195431_1.jpg[/img]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/6qw6qb2x3/30332413575_3cc877f230_o.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Lendri
Race:  Custom High Elf
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.08
Weight:  69
Body:  Custom UUNP
Skin:  Demoniac (2k & 4k)
Armor:  Steel Nord Plate Bikini Armor
Weapon:  Witchers Silver Sword
Spells:  Flames, Healing, Fury
Location:  Whiterun - Drunken Huntsman

Style:  Two Handed Boss
Class:  Spellsword

Levels with player.
Skills bonuses/Perk trees:  Destruction, Illusion, Restoration, Two Handed, Block, Heavy Armor

**********

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/drfl5cfbb/1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Rimona
[font=Verdana]Race:  Custom Nord Based[/font]
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  40
Body:  Custom UUNP
Skin:  Demoniac (2k & 4k options)
Armor:  Celes Nightingale Armor (doubled armor rating)
Weapons:  Celes Hooma, Bow, Arrows, & Her Hands
Location:  Riverwood - Sleeping Giant

[i]*Tattoos used in some screenshots are not on follower mod*

[/i]Fighting Style:  One Handed with Spells on Left Hand

Levels with player.
Skills bonuses/Perk trees:  Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration, Illusion, One Hand, Light Armor

**********

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/n89zppojr/what_of_it_2_29035267300_o.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Wren
Race:  Breton/Vampire Hybrid
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  20
Body:  Custom UUNP
Skin:  Demoniac (2k & 4k options)
Armor:  Witcher 3 Yennefer DLC Option (doubled armor rating)

Weapons:  Ebony Dagger & Her Hands
Location:  Whiterun - Hall of the Dead

Class:  Combat Mage Necro
Style:  Human Magic (think Serana)

Levels with player.
Skills bonuses/Perk trees:  Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration, Illusion, Sneak, Light Armor

All Tested With AFT & EFF
ENBs Pictured in Screenshots:  SnapDragon, Vividian, RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/ylrxn69on/20170116194603_1.jpg[/img]
[i][font=Verdana]*Please See Videos Section For Videos On The Individual Followers*[/font][/i]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]

[/u][/b]
Dawnguard

[b][u]Armor Version[/u][/b][/font]

Dawnguard
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels[/url]
HDT Compatible Skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE
[/url]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Please uninstall the individual follower .esps if you have them installed to avoid errors.

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/cuuirf5dz/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?]thedoodlebob[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/bethesdamods/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/218944591881610/]Skyrim Mods & Modders[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/1273841859340346/]Children of Akatosh

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]
[/url]Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

[font=Verdana] Q:  Why release a merge pack when they are available individually?
A:  A merge pack was requested by many so they could save some room in their load order.[/font]

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  No; thedoodlebob/PillowFun has no intention of releasing them to the public.

[font=Verdana]Q:  Why are they so overpowered?
A:  They were designed for high level players playing on higher difficulty levels.
A:  Feel free to edit for [u]personal use[/u] according to your personal taste/playing style.[/font]

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*
A:  I'm not changing any look of the character since it's not my character.

[font=Verdana]Q:  Will you merge *insert body type here*?
A:  There are no immediate plans[/font]

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  I will probably refuse any little girl/boy looking follower requests though.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
